events.description: Gleyber Torres doubles (2) on a sharp line drive to left fielder Steven Kwan.
Aaron Judge walks.
Anthony Rizzo singles on a sharp line drive to right fielder Will Brennan. Gleyber Torres to 3rd. Aaron Judge to 2nd.
Giancarlo Stanton doubles (2) on a sharp line drive to center fielder Myles Straw. Gleyber Torres scores. Aaron Judge scores. Anthony Rizzo to 3rd.
Willie Calhoun lines out to second baseman Andres Gimenez. 1 out

Jose Trevino reaches on a fielder's choice out, pitcher Shane Bieber to third baseman Jose Ramirez to catcher Mike Zunino. Anthony Rizzo out at home. Giancarlo Stanton to 3rd. Jose Trevino to 2nd. 2 outs
Franchy Cordero strikes out swinging. 3 outs
Steven Kwan walks.
Amed Rosario grounds into a force out, shortstop Anthony Volpe to second baseman Gleyber Torres. Steven Kwan out at 2nd. Amed Rosario to 1st. 1 out
Jose Ramirez grounds out to first baseman Anthony Rizzo. Amed Rosario to 2nd. 2 outs
Josh Naylor pops out to third baseman Isiah Kiner-Falefa. 3 outs
Isiah Kiner-Falefa singles on a line drive to left fielder Steven Kwan.
Anthony Volpe strikes out swinging. Isiah Kiner-Falefa steals (1) 2nd base. 1 out

Isiah Kiner-Falefa out at 3rd, catcher Mike Zunino to third baseman Jose Ramirez. Gleyber Torres to 2nd.

Pitching Change: Colten Brewer replaces Domingo German.
